actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: Expressing the appreciation of the Congress for the heroism and political achievements of Brigadier General Francis Marion and encouraging local communities throughout South Carolina to prepare ceremonies and activities to commemorate his great victories and political achievements during the Revolutionary War.

summary.text: Expresses appreciation for the achievements of Brigadier General Francis Marion, a Revolutionary War hero from South Carolina. Requires the Secretary of Defense to prepare a plaque honoring Marion for placement at the Francis Marion College in Florence, South Carolina.

titles.title: Expressing the appreciation of the Congress for the heroism and political achievements of Brigadier General Francis Marion and encouraging local communities throughout South Carolina to prepare ceremonies and activities to commemorate his great victories and political achievements during the Revolutionary War.
